item.title: What to see in Frankfurt (Oder): a day trip from Berlin
item.description: A visit to a town in Brandenburg divided by a border into the German Frankfurt (Oder) and the Polish SÅ‚ubice after the WWII. East German history, communist architecture, a border crossing, beautiful landscape, old cinemas, and hopes for a new era.
